title: Condo Available For Lease Detroit 48201
posting_body: IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME
I MAY HAVE OTHER PROPERTIES TO PASS BY YOU
Luxury Boutique Loft Living in the heart of the Entertainment District.
Located right downtown behind the Fox Theatre, this executive 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom suite has access to all of the cites exciting amenities.

The space features high gloss stained concrete flooring throughout, 8' entry doors, maple European style cabinets, stainless appliances and granite countertops in the kitchen, full tile bathrooms with floor-to-ceiling mirrors, rain shower heads with hand held spray, sleek modern design hotel-bathroom, in-unit washer/dryer, & guest entry with video surveillance/security.
Surrounded by entertainment, and walkable to anything Downtown.
Parking in adjacent garage available for $150/month.

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
The buyer is advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection and with appropriate professionals.
